010package imagingbook.lib.color;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013
014public class CssColorSequencer {
015        
016        private int nextColorIndex = 0;
017        
018        static Color[] ColorSet = CssColor.PreferredColors;
019        
020        public CssColorSequencer() {
021        }
022        
023        public CssColorSequencer(int firstIndex) {
024                nextColorIndex = firstIndex % ColorSet.length;
025        }
026        
027        public Color nextColor() {
028                Color c = ColorSet[nextColorIndex];
029                nextColorIndex = (nextColorIndex + 1) % ColorSet.length;
030                return c;
031        }
032        
033}
